retrieval.storage

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.storage.Storage

  • public final class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implement a storage which index pictures and response to search request from client

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

               ConfigServer config,
               GlobalDatabase globalDatabase)

               TestsVectorsNotFoundServerException,
               StartIndexException,
               ReadIndexException,
               java.lang.Exception
        Constructor for a server
        Parameters:
        idServer - Storage name
        config - Configuration object
        globalDatabase - Storage databse
        Throws:
        InternalServerException - Internal error during server start
        TestsVectorsNotFoundServerException - Tests vectors not found
        StartIndexException - Error during the start of index
        ReadIndexException - Error during the read of index
        java.lang.Exception

      • indexPicture

        public java.lang.Long indexPicture(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                   java.lang.Long id,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
                            throws AlreadyIndexedException,
                                   NoValidPictureException,
                                   PictureTooHomogeneous
        Index a picture directly in index (without waiting on queue) THIS METHOD IS NOT SAFE IF YOU MAKE MULTIPLE INDEX
        Parameters:
        image - Picture
        id - Image id
        properties - Picture properties
        Returns:
        ID of picture
        Throws:
        AlreadyIndexedException
        NoValidPictureException
        PictureTooHomogeneous - Picture is too homogeneous to be indexed (ex: only one color,...)

                               throws TooMuchIndexRequestException

        Parameters:

        id - Image id
        properties - Picture properties
        Returns:
        Indexed Picture file
        Throws:
        TooMuchIndexRequestException - Waited queue are full

      • deletePictures

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> deletePictures(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
                                                           throws InternalServerException
        Delete pictures in ids list from storage THIS METHOD DOES NOT REMOVED PICTURES DATA FROM INDEX, just removed pictures from result. If this method is used many times, call purge method sometimes
        Parameters:
        ids - Pictures to delete
        Returns:
        Map with pictures path and exception (NoException if ok)
        Throws:
        InternalServerException - Error during delete

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Map with pictures path and exception (NoException if ok)
        Throws:

        Parameters:
        id - Picture id
        Returns:
        True if index doesn't contains data with id

      • getNBT

        public java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>> getNBT(java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>> visualWords)
                                                                                               throws WrongNumberOfTestsVectorsException
        Fill NBT (number of patches map with visual word B in index) for each visual words from visualwords structures FIRST PART OF SEARCH WITH CENTRAL SERVER
        Parameters:
        visualWords - Tests vectors lists and their visual words
        Returns:
        Visual words and their NBT
        Throws:
        WrongNumberOfTestsVectorsException - Central server has a different number of tests vectors than server.

      • getPicturesSimilarities

        public java.util.List<ResultSim> getPicturesSimilarities(java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,RequestPictureVisualWord>> vw,
                                                         int Niq,
                                                         int k)
        Get (maximum) k most similar pictures from server with vw and niq information SECOND PART OF SEARCH WITH CENTRAL SERVER
        Parameters:
        vw - Visual words from Request image Iq
        Niq - Number of patches extract from Iq
        k - Max similar pictures
        Returns:
        Most similar pictures
